tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_component_funding; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_funding AS SELECT c.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN f.component_funding_status IN ( SELECT acv.id FROM amp_category_class acc JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.amp_category_class_id = acc.id WHERE acc.keyname = 'component_funding_status' AND acv.category_value <> 'Rejected' ) THEN f.amp_component_funding_id END AS amp_component_funding_id, CASE WHEN f.component_funding_status IN ( SELECT acv.id FROM amp_category_class acc JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.amp_category_class_id = acc.id WHERE acc.keyname = 'component_funding_status' AND acv.category_value <> 'Rejected' ) THEN f.amp_component_funding_id END AS amp_fund_detail_id, c.title AS component_name, f.transaction_type, f.adjustment_type, adj.category_value AS adjustment_type_name, f.transaction_date, f.transaction_amount, f.currency_id, cu.currency_code, c.component_status, f.component_funding_status, ct.name AS component_type FROM amp_components c JOIN amp_component_funding f ON f.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id JOIN amp_currency cu ON cu.amp_currency_id = f.currency_id JOIN amp_category_value adj ON f.adjustment_type = adj.id JOIN amp_component_type ct ON ct.type_id = c.type WHERE c.component_status IN ( SELECT acv.id FROM amp_category_class acc JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.amp_category_class_id = acc.id WHERE acc.keyname = 'component_status' AND acv.category_value <> 'Rejected' ) ORDER BY c.amp_activity_id;
